title: Says "need to be level 7 to post"
body: I'm level 25 in game on this account, but on forums here is says I need to be level 7? Is there a different ranking system for here that I dont see or is this just a bug? Sorry if this is known about, new here :c

replies.body: An account may need to sync with the boards when it's posting for the first time.  It looks like your profile is now updated and showing as 25, so everything should be fine now.  Let me know if you have any issues posting.
Am I forgetting how long it takes to get from level <7 to level 25, or is the board just really slow at syncing?
You're just too fast!  It can take a bit of time for a boards profile to sync.  Usually a post or upvote can force the update.
Can't help being fast. It's in the name. It's a requirement
